description.fr: Lorsque votre héros gagne {value:Weapon.998.nb} {%AURA_SIGHT,plural:one}, vos compagnons gagnent la même. \--- {value:Pc,+, percent} aux DÉGÂTS des {%AURA_SIGHT,plural:other} de votre héros.
description.en: When your hero gains {value:Weapon.998.nb} {%AURA_SIGHT,plural:one}, your companions gain the same. \--- {value:Pc,+, percent} to your hero's {%AURA_SIGHT,plural:one} DAMAGE.
description.es: Cuando tu héroe gana {value:Weapon.998.nb} {%AURA_SIGHT,plural:one}, tus compañeros ganan la misma. \--- {value:Pc,+, percent} a los DAÑOS de las {%AURA_SIGHT,plural:other} de tu héroe.
description.de: Wenn dein Held eine {value:Weapon.998.nb} {%AURA_SIGHT,plural:one} erhält, erhalten sie auch deine Begleiter. \--- {value:Pc,+, percent} {%AURA_SIGHT,plural:other}-SCHADEN für deinen Helden.
description.pt: Quando seu herói ganha {value:Weapon.998.nb} {%AURA_SIGHT,plural:one}, seus companheiros ganham a mesma coisa. \--- {value:Pc,+, percent} aos DANOS das {%AURA_SIGHT,plural:other} do seu herói.
